title: Beyond the Truth
description: From a #1 Amazon Bestseller comes a story of betrayal, lies, and retribution. Will Jolene find her higher power in a man known for destruction? Or will he become her next addiction?Jolene is a runaway and recovering addict looking to change her life. She's a woman on a journey to erase her troubled past, in search of a higher power and fame. But when a god in a suit appears at her record signing her obsession over him will quickly become her addiction. He's dangerous and known to cause destruction yet she can't deny satisfying her desires in exchange for a tempting offer. Could he be her redemption? Or will he sabotage her path to righteousness?
author: Nicky F. Grant
